content: Hi Sai, I'm Rachel. If I were a tomato, how would you slice me? Don't say roughly, tomatoes have feelings too.
Hi Cy, I'm Rachel. If I were a tomato, how would you slice me? Don't say roughly. Tomatoes have feelings too.
Sai, can you describe your knife skills? And remember, we're not aiming for a horror movie set here.
Rachel, you think you're so funny, but you really aren't, and you're really annoying.
I hear that a lot, Sai. It's part of my charm. What's your experience cooking under pressure? Forget boiling point, we're not talking physics.
Hi, this is Sai. What's your name?
Hi Sai, I already mentioned it earlier, I'm Rachel. So, what's your go-to dish to cook? And no, instant noodles won't impress me.
